text: us ne jawaab diya ke mein to kisi bade pahaad ki panah mein aa jaonga jo mujhe pani se bacha lega, noah alaihisslaam ne kaha aaj Allah ke amr se bachane wala koi nahi, sirf wahi bachenge jin par Allah ka rahem hoa, osi waqt un duno ke darmiyan mauj haayal ho gayi aur wo dobne waalo mein se ho gaya
